blockingIssues.message: CommandExtractor not receiving language context from LanguageDetector
blockingIssues.details: 176 test failures due to commands missing language property association

blockingIssues.message: IntegrationPipeline exists but not connected to ReadmeParserImpl
blockingIssues.details: Components are isolated instead of properly integrated

blockingIssues.message: 242 out of 2068 tests failing (13% failure rate)
blockingIssues.details: Primary failures in command-extractor and language-detector integration

qualityImprovements.details: Mostly code quality issues, not blocking functionality

reasoning: The core integration between LanguageDetector and CommandExtractor is broken, causing 176 test failures. This is a critical blocking issue that prevents the system from working correctly. The IntegrationPipeline exists but isn't being used by ReadmeParserImpl. While there are many linting issues, they are quality improvements that can be deferred. The missing components (Framework Detection, YAML Generator, CLI Tool) are expected gaps planned for future implementation.
nextAction: Fix the CommandExtractor language context inheritance from LanguageDetector, then connect IntegrationPipeline to ReadmeParserImpl
